what-it-does: Checks for missing blank lines after the end of function or class.
why-is-this-bad:
PEP 8 recommends using blank lines as follows:



Two blank lines are expected between functions and classes
One blank line is expected between methods of a class.
example:
class User(object):
    pass
user = User()



Use instead:


class User(object):
    pass


user = User()
